name: Vapor Rider Sunrise
description:
Take your Toyota AE86 for a ride in the ether in this surreal driving simulator. Search a haunted landscape for lost futures and endless dreams, or just park and watch the sunrise from the mountain tops. 

Drive along  translucent highways while reflecting on the transient nature of the vapor, or seek out the wisdom of the goddess beneath a futuristic city.

Get out of your car and explore while listening to tunes. You can even place your own ramps in the world! 

Time stretches to infinity inside this driving playground. Collect cash and score points.  Hunt for lost relics and treasure in the dreamworld.

Features:

  • chase dancing tigers under mars
  • listen to chill music while the rain falls
  • never stop driving
  • find spiritual harmony within the vapor
  • place ramps to build custom stunts
